title: Estimate value of a function from first derivative

content.description: A differentiable function <math> <mi>f</mi> </math> has the property that <math> <mrow> <msup> <mi>f</mi> <mo>′</mo> </msup> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>3</mn> </mrow> </math> for <math> <mrow> <mn>1</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>8</mn> </mrow> </math> and <math> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mn>5</mn> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mn>6</mn> </mrow> </math>. Which of the following could be true?

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
